alert.note: Alert for Waushara (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 12:20AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Waushara County through 100 AM CDT... At 1220 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Lake Wazeecha to near New Rome. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Plainfield around 1250 AM CDT. Wautoma around 100 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Coloma, Silver Lake, Wild Rose, Hancock, Mount Morris and Richford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
